clean_text:
SaaS Unicorn Tracker - SaaSBoomi Built by founders, for founders. AIBoomi Annual 2026 is open. Snag your passes > here Search India SaaS Unicorn Tracker Indian SaaS companies valued at $1B or more SaaSBoomi Unicorn Board This is a curated list of SaaS companies valued at $1B+ out of India. SaaSBoomi sources data from research firm Tracxn for the list which is periodically updated. Valuations are based on disclosed funding rounds. The list is in reverse chronological order of entry into the unicorn club. Tracking unicorns is one way to look at the rise of an ecosystem. It shows the scaling up of B2B SaaS companies from India. SaaSBoomi celebrates this with the India SaaS Unicorn Tracker. 23 Companies $8.5+ billion Total Funding $55.5+ billion Total Valuation B2B SaaS Unicorns from India Company Description Post-funding valuation in USD Funding in USD Base in India Year of Founding Unicorn Club entry Stage Amagi Cloud based CTV ad insertion software 1,400 M 359 M Bengaluru 2008 March, 2022 Series F BrowserStack Cloud based software testing suite solutions 4,000 M 250 M Mumbai 2011 June, 2021 Series B Chargebee Cloud-based subscription billing and revenue management solutions for businesses 3,500 M 480 M Pune 2011 April, 2021 Series H CommerceIQ Provider of SaaS and AI-based analytics software for e-commerce businesses 1,000 M 195 M Bengaluru 2012 March, 2022 Series D Darwinbox Tech company offering end-to-end 1,200 M 281 M Pune 2011 August, 2021 Series E Postman Platform offering API development solutions 5,600 M 433 M Bengaluru 2014 June, 2020 Series D Shiprocket Provider of logistic solution for eCommerce businesses 1,300 M 330 M Gurugram 2012 August, 2022 Series E Uniphore AI and cloud-based platform offering conversational service automation solutions 2,500 M 657 M Chennai 2008 February, 2022 Series E Zenoti Provider of cloud-driven salon business management software 1,500 M 331 M Hyderabad 2010 December, 2020 Series D Zeta Provider of cloud-based payment and banking solutions for banks and enterprises 1,500 M 349 M Bengaluru 2015 May, 2021 Series C Zoho AI powered marketing and sales management platform 5,944 M Chennai 1996 April, 2019 Bootstrapped Note: 1. We have excluded fintech unicorns from this list. 2. CitiusTech was acquired and hence excluded from this list. Please reach out to hello@saasboomi.org if you think this list is missing a company or if data needs to be updated. Applications for SaaSBoomi Annual ’26 are open. Save your seat! Join the builders shaping what’s next in AI Learn More Related Stories Blog Product AI for India SaaS and what it means I recently found myself in a room full of SaaS founders discussing the risks that generative AI (GenAI) poses for their companies. I couldn’t help but wonder how, as an industry, we’ve spent so much time talking about how AI is going to replace humans, how GenAI is going to throw people off their jobs […] Ashwini Asokan Blog Growth Steering a product through GenAI disruption “We will be ready to sacrifice our product if required, because we have to consciously call out that we will be an innovative company.” – Amit Srivastava, CTO and co-founder, Constems-AI. Sumit Chakraberty Blog Growth SaaS to AI.SaaS: A generational shift for India SaaS A joint study conducted by McKinsey in partnership with SaaSBoomi had some eye-opening insights about the shift from SaaS to AI.SaaS and what the road ahead looks like. The session outlined what the AI.SaaS opportunity looks like – from the emerging trends, the implications for India SaaS, and how to approach building a scalable AI-first business. SaaSBoomi Editorial Team Reports Reports 2025 Edition Unlocking India’s $100B Domestic Software Opportunity By 2035, India’s domestic software market is poised to explode into a USD 100 billion opportunity, with homegrown companies positioned to claim up to 50% of this prize. 1Lattice, SaaSBoomi We curate the best articles, interviews, podcasts, and videos we think will help you grow your SaaS business. Our mission is to enable founders to grow, scale, and win in global markets with help from peers. We are a volunteer-driven, non-profit ecosystem builder. #ProductNation. Made in India.
